title: Mulberry cuts a quarter of HQ staff after sales slump and bigger losses
description: CEO says he will launch review to make company ‘leaner, more agile’ and the firm will ‘renew its relevance’Business live – latest updatesMulberry is cutting a quarter of its head office staff, as the beleaguered British luxury handbag maker reported that half-year sales slumped by almost a fifth and losses had widened.The company, which last month rejected a £111m bid from 37% shareholder Mike Ashley’s Frasers Group, is in the process of cutting 85 roles from the 350 staff employed in corporate functions. title: 30 Best Winter Dresses For Every Occasion, From Casual Outings to Holiday Parties
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. Frost is slowly nipping at our noses, which means our slouchy winter jackets and over-the-knee boots are back in the wardrobe rotation. As you swap out your fall dresses with their wintry counterparts, consider upgrading some of your favorite styles.Throughout the chilly months ahead, you might opt for long-sleeve sweater dresses, velvet dresses for a more festive feel, or maxi dresses for extra coverage. We’ve rounded up a range of trending silhouettes appropriate for various occasions, from casual outings and work to holiday parties and winter weddings. From comfy-cozy frocks to bedazzled gowns, the best cool-weather dresses from reliable reader-favorite brands like J.Crew, Anthropologie, Zara, Abercrombie & Fitch, and Madewell are ahead. DashDividers_1_500x100 Sweater Dresses Whether you’re dressing for the office, casual dinners, log cabin escapes, or holiday market shopping, a sweater dress will serve you well. There’s a lot of variety, from jersey to cashmere knit, and lightweight to thick — but all these cozy styles will keep you warm and comfortable throughout the season. We’ve found the best new sweater dresses in a range of lengths and colors, such as a long-sleeve button-up frock that doubles as a long cardigan for work, a red maxi for winter festivities, or an off-the-shoulder mini dress for date night. DashDividers_1_500x100 Holiday Party Dresses We’re already thinking ahead to which holiday party dresses we want to wear to our White Elephant gift exchanges, New Years Eve celebrations, and everything in between. If the occasion calls for some sparkle, opt for chunky sequins or shiny satin. For events like office gatherings and at-home Christmas dinners, you can pick up styles featuring  stretchy shirred bodices and casual takes on tulle that are still festive, but a bit more comfortable and versatile. DashDividers_1_500x100 Velvet Dresses When we think of winter fabrics, our minds automatically go to velvet. It’s soft, smooth, and simply scrumptious — a great option for cocktail events and winter weddings, especially in a fitted midi or maxi dress silhouette. We also found minis with fun details like fluttery sleeves, lace collars, and trendy bows for a range of other winter festivities, like potlucks and NYE parties.  DashDividers_1_500x100 Winter Wedding Guest Dresses If you’ve got weddings approaching and still don’t have a wedding guest look, we’ve got you. Look out for rich jewel tones and classic black dresses with a twist (think bows and off-the-shoulder necklines). If the nuptials require cocktail attire, consider a mini or midi dress that’s chic and versatile enough to wear again at other winter parties. A black-tie dress codes calls for a gown, but you get bonus points if it’s in a festive color and bedazzled to the max. DashDividers_1_500x100 Winter Maxi Dresses Maxi dresses aren’t just for the summer — in fact, they’re arguably ideal for winter, as the ankle-skimming, floor-grazing styles will keep your legs shielded from the frigid air. For casual occasions, lounge dresses and long sweater dresses are great. And for more formal events, look for elevated turtlenecks and off-the-shoulder necklines. We’re especially eyeing trendy burgundy styles, to bring the fall color into winter. Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?37 Holiday Party Dresses For Winter FestivitiesYour Dream Sweater Dress Is Only A Click AwayNew Year’s Eve Party Dresses You'll Wear Again
author: Amanda Randone

title: 28 Nordstrom Black Friday Clothing Deals Worth Adding To Cart
description: The hustle and bustle (and, let’s face it, stress) of Black Friday shopping can make it tough to zero in on what’s actually worth adding to your cart. That’s where we come in — to guide you through the chaos and spotlight the best Black Friday clothing deals. And if you’re a die-hard Nordstrom shopper (as many of our R29 readers are), you’ll love our curated roundup of the very best fashion finds on sale this year.Right now, Nordstrom’s Early Black Friday Deals are live, running from November 15 to 20, with up to 70% off select women’s clothing. We’ve scoured the sale section to bring you our top picks, from cutesy cardigans (up to 40% off Free People sweaters!), holiday-ready tops, and trendy jackets to fan-favorites like the Skims lounge dress, as well as bold outerwear (hello, scarf coat) and must-have denim (key Frame jeans are 33% off, for one). Heads up: Some items are available in limited colorways and sizes, so we recommend adding your favorites to your cart stat. And don’t forget to bookmark this page — once Nordstrom’s official Black Friday (November 21 to 29) and Cyber Monday (November 30 to December 1) sales kick off, we’ll be updating our edit with even more editor-approved pieces. Whether you’re on the hunt for the perfect fashion gift, upgrading your winter wardrobe, or snagging those trusty basics, we’ve got you covered throughout the mega-sale season.At Refinery29, we’re here to help you navigate this overwhelming world of stuff. All of our market picks are independently selected and curated by the editorial team. If you buy something we link to on our site, Refinery29 may earn commission.32% Off BCBGMAXAZRIA Reversible Wool Blend Barn JacketThe shacket gets the barn jacket treatment: This reversible style is solid camel on one side and plaid on the other — two timeless looks, endless wear.Shop NordstromBCBGMAXAZRIA Reversible Wool Blend Barn Jacket, $, available at Nordstrom30% Off Madewell Stripe Long Sleeve Rugby ShirtWe’re so here for the rugby shirt resurgence. The bold, extra-thick stripes on this one are perfection.Shop NordstromMadewell Stripe Long Sleeve Rugby Shirt, $, available at Nordstrom25% Off Eloquii Plissé Short Sleeve Maxi DressA little luster and a lot of gorgeousness, this plissé dress is a total stunner for cocktail parties or dinners out.Shop NordstromEloquii Plissé Short Sleeve Maxi Dress, $, available at Nordstom33% Off Frame Easy Wide Flare Jeans Frame jeans always have our hearts. Right now, we’re loving dark black denim paired with light gray sweaters and tops.Shop NordstromFrame Easy Wide Flare Jeans, $, available at Nordstrom25% Off Favorite Daughter The Suits You Blazer This is the ultimate red blazer for a celebratory moment. Pair it with matching trousers for a power look or a burgundy slip dress for a softer take on the trending color-drenched palette.Shop NordstromFavorite Daughter The Suits You Blazer, $, available at Nordstrom40% Off Free People Sunbeam Oversize Turtleneck Sweater Fact: No sweater is cozier than an oversized turtleneck. We won’t be taking questions.Shop NordstromFree People Sunbeam Oversize Turtleneck Sweater, $, available at Nordstrom49% Nocturne Off One-Shoulder Midi DressThe holiday dress you didn’t see coming: The pale yellow makes a standout on its own, but the sculptural silver hardware takes it to the next level. Shop NordstromNocturne One-Shoulder Midi Dress, $, available at Nordstrom40% Off Ulla Johnson Kassi Eyelet Flutter Sleeve Cotton Top If you’re pumped that boho is back, this olive green top is your ultimate fall go-to. It'll be perfect with denim in dark blue or black washes.Shop NordstromUlla Johnson Kassi Eyelet Flutter Sleeve Cotton Top, $, available at Nordstrom28% Off Levi's Water Resistant Side Zip Maxi Puffer CoatYou love Levi’s jeans, but Levi's outerwear? So. Good.Shop NordstromLevi's Water Resistant Side Zip Maxi Puffer Coat, $, available at Nordstrom35% Off L'AGENCE Talullah Jeweled Button Cardigan How whimsical are these jeweled buttons? We love a low-effort festive outfit that still makes an impact.Shop NordstromL'Agence Talullah Jeweled Button Cardigan, $, available at Nordstom60% Off Nordstrom Strapless A-Line DressCorporatecore gray meets ‘90s minimalism in this perfect day-to-night hero piece. Pair it with a blazer and boots, then swap your jewelry to create two distinct looks.Shop Nordstrom Nordstrom Strapless A-Line Dress, $, available at Nordstrom50% Off Pistola Irene Stripe Shirt As if we needed another oversized button-down... but, come on — this one is too good.Shop NordstromPistola Irene Stripe Shirt, $, available at Nordstrom35% Off Adore Me Matilde Long Sleeve & Pants Pajama Set It wouldn’t be the holidays without adding a new PJ set to the mix. We love this one in a trendy burgundy hue.Shop NordstromAdore Me Matilde Long Sleeve & Pants Pajama Set, $, available at Nordstrom42% Off Lauren Ralph Lauren Reversible Hooded Faux Fur Coat Another two-for-one alert! Catch us layering this cozy shearling coat over everything from denim and knits to loungewear.Shop NordstromLauren Ralph Lauren Reversible Hooded Faux Fur Coat, $, available at Nordstrom28% Off Mango Floral Burnout One Shoulder Velvet TopIt’s giving Carrie Bradshaw meets Brat — a fun, slightly edgier party top to rock this holiday season.Shop NordstromMango Floral Burnout One Shoulder Velvet Top, $, available at Nordstrom29% Off Skims Soft Lounge Mock Neck Long Sleeve Maxi DressOpinion: The limit on Skims lounge dresses does not exist. I'm drooling over this amethyst hue.Shop NordstromSkims Soft Lounge Mock Neck Long Sleeve Maxi Dress, $, available at Nordstrom30% Off Treasure & Bond Merino Wool & Cotton Pointelle Sweater Vest Whether worn solo or layered, the craftsmanship in this vest is next-level — a nice way to add texture to an otherwise drab winter outfit.Shop NordstromTreasure & Bond Merino Wool & Cotton Pointelle Sweater Vest, $, available at Nordstrom25% Off Reformation Oakley Vest A sweet little peplum to bring sleek, feminine vibes to your next outfit — not overly cutesy, just the right touch of demure. Pair it with tailored trousers, a slip skirt, or jeans.Shop NordstromReformation Oakley Vest, $, available at Nordstrom29% Sam Edelman Off Longline Faux Fur Coat It doesn’t get tastier than a chocolate brown faux-fur coat. The oversized lapels make it extra snuggly.Shop NordstromSam Edelman Longline Faux Fur Coat, $, available at Nordstom30% Off AllSaints Connie Francesco Long Sleeve Top The squiggly texture adds just enough interest to this versatile layering top.Shop NordstromAllSaints Connie Francesco Long Sleeve Top, $, available at Nordstom45% Off Rue Sophie Jardin Wool Blend Jacket With Scarf The way we’re obsessed with scarf coats, and this one in black is the ultimate versatile option. Shop NordstromRue Sophie Jardin Wool Blend Jacket with Scarf, $, available at Nordstrom35% Off A.L.C. Cooper Stripe Knit Polo Come for the retro vibes, stay for the body-skimming fit. This top's good for layering under jackets, blazers, and coats.Shop NordstromA.L.C. Cooper Stripe Knit Polo, $, available at Nordstrom33% Off BP. Fleece Detail Oversize Crewneck Sweatshirt A new oversized sweatshirt in a delicious chocolate brown hue? Don’t mind if we do.Shop NordstromBP. Fleece Detail Oversize Crewneck Sweatshirt, $, available at Nordstrom70% Off Good American Sandwash Twist Strap Crop Tank Your basic black tank could never. The rolled detailing on this slinky top takes the simplest outfit formula to new heights.Shop NordstromGood American Sandwash Twist Strap Crop Tank, $, available at Nordstrom30% Off Staud Marino Crop JacketBring a little structured mod to your look with this olive jacket. The clean lines make it feel effortlessly luxe.Shop NordstromStaud Marino Crop Jacket, $, available at Nordstom55% Off WAYF Terri Bouclé Rib Wrap Sweater Wrap yourself in comfort with this beige ribbed knit. It does the most (in the best way), pairing with polished bottoms for work, feeling effortless with jeans on the weekend and elevating leggings for lounging or travel days.Shop NordstromWayf Terri Bouclé Rib Wrap Sweater, $, available at Nordstrom24% Off Nike Sportswear Phoenix High Waist Wide Leg SweatpantsWide-leg lounge pants till we die (not that we’re dramatic about it or anything). Shop NordstromNike Sportswear Phoenix High Waist Wide Leg Sweatpants, $, available at Nordstom25% Off & Other Stories Boxy Cotton T-Shirt Found: your perfect boxy white tee. It’s so good, we’d recommend buying a backup (or two).Shop Nordstrom& Other Stories Boxy Cotton T-Shirt, $, available at NordstromLike what you see? author: Victoria Montalti

title: 14 Chic Loungewear Sets to Unwind in This Season
description: One of the many things we've learned over the past few years is the value of having chic loungewear sets on hand when you just can't bring yourself to leave the house. Heading into cozy season, we anticipate that we'll be seeing (and enjoying!) even more of those lazy, couch-ridden days in the coming months - and being the planners that we are, we're also prepping our closets accordingly by investing in a few new matching loungewear sets to help get us through the season's coziest months. We're talking sweat set pairings, T-shirt and short duos for those who run warm, four-piece sets that can be mixed and matched, and so much more. Since we're not in the business of gatekeeping shopping secrets here at PS, we're happy to report that there are a lot of great winter loungewear sets to stock up on this season - and all from some of our favorite fashion brands like Amazon, Free People, Skims, Calvin Klein, and so many more. Whether you're in the market for some affordable loungewear sets, are looking to invest in a few luxurious styles ahead of winter and the forthcoming holiday season, or just scoping out the softest loungewear sets in the hopes of upgrading your work-from-home wardrobe with a cozier touch, we've got you covered with some of the best matching styles to shop (and live in!) this season - and at every price point, too. Browse our curated shopping guide below for the best loungewear sets, and prepare to unwind in style this fall.
author: Marisa Petrarca

title: 7 Button-Down Shirts That Upgrade Any Outfit
description: If you're building out your wardrobe, there are a few classic staples you should always have on hand - specifically a fitted button-down blouse or work top. There are a plethora of reasons to fill your wardrobe with stylish button-down tops: they're pieces that fit well, make you smile, and can be thrown on in a pinch to create a put-together look. Plus, they can be styled with basically anything in your closet - from comfortable jeans to a sleek pair of white sneakers, or even a sweater vest. A crisp button-down shirt is the one style that's designed to work for it all, regardless of the occasion or dress code. Since it's arguably the most versatile top, we did a little online shopping for you and rounded up the best button-down shirts for women, with styles that come from a range of retailers. Whether you're in the market for a crisp white shirt, something oversize and comfortable, or a linen style that's great as a coverup for the beach, you're bound to find a new favorite piece below. Keep reading to shop our picks.
